revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Eumitcom |model=WL11000SA-N |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=10/31/2000 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=OEM |type=access point,bridge |fcc_id=LLM007WL11000-2 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=AMD |cpu1_model=ElanSC400-66AC;AMD, Elan SC400-66AC, A- 0023APA, (M) AMD; |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29F800TMC-90 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=4 |ram1_brand=GLT |ram1_model=GLT4160L16-60J4 |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (16-bit) |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=DE-9 |wi1_module=Eumitcom WL11000-2 |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (16-bit) |wi1_chip1_brand=Harris |wi1_chip1_model=HFA3841 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=HFA3861 |wi1_chip3_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip3_model=HFA3683A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=RP-TNC |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand=Realtek |eth_chip1_model=RTL8019AS;RTL8019AS, 04354A1, 018F TAIWAN; |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=10M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |tp_firmware=OpenAP |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=WLAN |default_ssid_regex=^WLAN$ |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:90:D1 |oui_eth=00:90:D1 }} The AP has been resold under the following brands and names..
*[[Addtron AWS-100]] *[[Cheetah WB3001A]] [http://lists.contesting.com/archives/html/Karlnet/2003-06/msg00005.html] *[[Netcomm NP2000AP]] ([http://web.archive.org/web/200101072118/http://www.netcomm.com.au/products/19.htm Archived product page]) *[[SMC SMC2652W]] ([http://www.smc.com/index.cfm?event=downloads.doSearchCriteria&localeCode=EN_USA&knowsPartNumber=false&productCategory=5&modelNumber=451&partNumber=2173&downloadType=0&os=0 Downloads]), OUI 00:90:D1 (Ethernet or WLAN?) *[[SMC SMC2682W]] (bridge, [http://www.smc.com/index.cfm?event=downloads.searchResults&localeCode=EN_USA&productCategory=94&partNumber=1737&modelNumber=507&knowsPartNumber=false&userPartNumber= Downloads]) [http://lists.contesting.com/archives/html/Karlnet/2003-06/msg00005.html] *[[USRobotics USR2450]] ([http://www.usr.com/support/product-template.asp?prod=2450 Product page]) These devices could run [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/OpenAP OpenAP] ([http://www.seattlewireless.net/OpenAP Seattle Wireless]), an open source firmware (the first) released by Instant802 Networks. The OpenAP website was originally http://opensource.instant802.com , then changed to http://opensource.devicescape.com/ , now defunct. [http://www.teletronics.com/11MAP.pdf Manual] on Teletronics' website, [http://www.bizarnet.ro/download/wireless/WL2411SA-N/WL2411SA-N_bridge_manual.pdf Bridge manual] on bizarnet.ro Default password from Eumitcom may be "WLAN_AP" for access point models and "WLAN_BRIDGE" for bridge models. Username may be "default" or "Default" (USR2450 manual specifies this one). [http://www.wiresncode.com/projects/wireless/openap/ OpenAP Hardware Hacking] t'was on Guerilla.net (RIP).. kindly archived by [http://www.jaffa.it/mirrors/guerrilla.net/reference/openAP/index.html jaffa.it] ==Images== File:Eumitcom_WL11000SA-N_board_top_card_in.jpg|board top (card in) File:Eumitcom_WL11000SA-N_board_top_card_removed.jpg|board top (card removed) File:Eumitcom_WL11000SA-N_board_bot.jpg|board bottom [[Has images::internal| ]] [[File:Addtron AWS-100.jpg]][[Has images::external| ]]
